name: Aspirin
sideEffects: May cause stomach to file complaints
Occasional dizziness when standing up to reality
Sudden urge to read medicine labels obsessively
indications: For the pain of existing in 2025
To pretend your headache is from too much work
contraindications: If you love your stomach lining
Avoid if you plan to party hard tonight
Not recommended for people who hate side effects

name: Metformin
indications: For confusing sugar levels that confuse everyone
To blame when snacks mysteriously disappear
contraindications: If you plan to binge on sweets tomorrow
Avoid if you hate surprises
Not for people who prefer chaos over control

name: Amoxicillin
composition: Also a mood enhancer (if you believe hard enough)
contraindications: If you prefer your good gut bacteria
Avoid if you're a probiotic enthusiast
Not recommended during yogurt appreciation week

name: Loratadine (Claritin)
composition: Contains side effect of feeling too chill
contraindications: If you actually want to stay alert
Avoid while operating heavy machinery or life decisions
Not for people who enjoy being stuffed up

name: Omeprazole (Prilosec)
composition: Memory eraser for bad food choices
sideEffects: Gas and bloating invite unexpected guests
Increased confidence in spicy food consumption
indications: Heartburn caused by poor life decisions
contraindications: If you actually enjoy gastritis
Avoid if you hate stomach comfort
Not for masochists who love acid reflux

name: Ibuprofen (Advil)
sideEffects: Stomach irritation (because everything has a price)
Sudden belief that you can exercise again
contraindications: If you have trust issues with your stomach
Avoid if you're already on thin ice with your liver
Not for people who enjoy suffering

name: Cetirizine (Zyrtec)
sideEffects: Sudden urge to become an indoor person
contraindications: If you enjoy the thrill of constant sneezing
Avoid if you want to stay awake during meetings
Not recommended for professional athletes

name: Paracetamol (Tylenol)
sideEffects: Liver gives you judgmental looks (high doses)
Sudden motivation to tackle life problems
indications: When everything hurts but you can't afford therapy
Fever reduction for the dramatically inclined
contraindications: If you prefer to feel every ache and pain
Avoid if your liver is already working overtime
Not for people who enjoy being miserable

name: Montelukast (Singulair)
indications: When breathing becomes a competitive sport
contraindications: If you enjoy the dramatic wheeze
Avoid if you prefer indoor hermit lifestyle
Not for people who hate easy breathing

name: Lansoprazole (Prevacid)
composition: Contains confidence in spicy food choices
sideEffects: Sudden craving for street food adventures
indications: When your stomach stages a revolt
GERD management for the chronically anxious
contraindications: If you enjoy the burn of regret
Avoid if you prefer your stomach angry
Not for masochistic food enthusiasts
